title: Cave Explorer
description:
Cave Explorer, by John Earnest

Discover the secrets of a mysterious tunnel system.

W (Keypad 5) - Move up
A (Keypad 7) - Move left
S (Keypad 8) - Move down
D (Keypad 9) - Move right
E (Keypad 6) - Pick up/set down blocks
Q (Keypad 4) - Reset level

title: Danm8ku
description:
Danm8ku, by buffi

Bullet hell for the CHIP-8! Survive 8 waves of exciting bullet patterns!

W (Keypad 5) - Move up
A (Keypad 7) - Move left
S (Keypad 8) - Move down
D (Keypad 9) - Move right

title: Slippery Slope
description:
Slippery Slope, by John Earnest

The ice we skate is getting pretty thin. The water's getting warm so you might as well swim.

W (Keypad 5) - Move up
A (Keypad 7) - Move left
S (Keypad 8) - Move down
D (Keypad 9) - Move right
E (Keypad 6) - Reset level

title: Space Invaders
description:
Space Invaders, by David Winter

Defend the world from an alien invasion in this recreation of a classic arcade game.

Q (Keypad 4) - Move left
E (Keypad 6) - Move right
W (Keypad 5) - Start/Shoot

title: Tetris
description:
Tetris (1991), by Fran Dachille

Fit together falling blocks to complete lines in this iconic puzzle challenge.

W (Keypad 5) - Move left
E (Keypad 6) - Move right
Q (Keypad 4) - Rotate left
A (Keypad 7) - Fast drop
